author: DryRun
body:
A few updates:

- Fix crash in RecHitTask exposed by beam splashes. For the plan-1 collapsed RecHits that do not exist in the actual detector, the HcalElectronicsId must not be used. One such case was hidden by an energy cut, so wasn't noticed earlier.
- Take adc2fC conversion from conditions instead of a hard-coded table.
- Integrated a fix for the number of samples in trigger primitive emulation, needed for TPTask to work.
- Add HF dual anode asymmetry plots.
- Smaller fixes: adjustments to axis ranges, ADC vs TDC plot, fix uMNIO crate# in fed2crate map, add HEP17 to local run tasks (LEDTask, PedestalTask, LaserTask).
title: HCALDQM: fix RecHitTask crash, adc2fC from DB, fix TPTask
